webDev.metaTitle: Website development | Web development — STEPS LAB
webDev.metaDescription: Website and web development: business sites, landings, corporate platforms. AI-accelerated development from the web studio.
webDev.title: Website development and web development
webDev.intro: Website development for business: business sites, landings, corporate platforms. The web studio builds websites that deliver results.
webDev.whatWeDo_p1: STEPS LAB web studio develops websites and web apps that work for your business. Every project starts with analyzing goals, audience and business processes.
webDev.whatWeDo_p2: We use AI for efficiency — quality product and favorable terms for you. Every decision goes through a business-sense filter. Website development is not just code, it's results.
webDev.businessSites_desc: Corporate sites with content management, integrations and analytics.
webDev.landings_desc: High-conversion landings for products, services and marketing campaigns.
webDev.corporatePlatforms_desc: Complex web apps with multi-tier architecture and integrations.
webDev.process_1_text: We research your business, goals and audience. Define technical requirements and solution architecture.
webDev.process_2_text: We create structure and interface focused on conversion and user experience.
webDev.process_3_text: AI-accelerated development with focus on code quality, performance and scalability.
webDev.process_4_text: Comprehensive testing, optimization and launch with post-release support.
webDev.resultsText: Our projects show 200-400% conversion growth and improved SEO rankings.

aiAutomation.metaTitle: AI development & automation | STEPS LAB — web studio
aiAutomation.metaDescription: AI development for business: process automation, CRM integrations, forms, content processes. Experienced web studio.
aiAutomation.title: AI development and automation
aiAutomation.intro: AI development for business: forms, CRM integrations, content processes. The studio automates routine so you focus on strategy.
aiAutomation.whatWeDo_p1: AI development and business process automation. The web studio integrates smart solutions into websites and web apps that save time and resources.
aiAutomation.whatWeDo_p2: Our approach to AI development is controlled and transparent. We use technology as a tool for web development, not as a black box.
aiAutomation.crm_desc: Automation of lead handling, lead generation and customer communications.
aiAutomation.contentProcesses_desc: AI-assisted content creation and processing with quality control.
aiAutomation.formsData_desc: Smart forms with automatic validation and data processing.
aiAutomation.process_1_text: We identify routine tasks and automation opportunities.
aiAutomation.process_2_text: We design automation architecture with business logic in mind.
aiAutomation.process_3_text: We implement AI tools and configure processes.
aiAutomation.process_4_text: We verify system operation and optimize for maximum efficiency.
aiAutomation.resultsText: 60-80% time savings through automation of routine processes.

mvpStartups.metaTitle: MVP for startups | Fast development — STEPS LAB
mvpStartups.metaDescription: MVP development for startups: fast launch, hypothesis validation. Website and web app development studio in 6-10 weeks. AI-accelerated web development.
mvpStartups.title: MVP for startups
mvpStartups.intro: Fast minimum product development. The web studio builds MVPs to validate hypotheses and get market feedback. In weeks.
mvpStartups.whatWeDo_p1: MVP is a minimum version of a product for quick business hypothesis validation. The web studio specializes in MVP development: websites and web apps in minimum time.
mvpStartups.whatWeDo_p2: MVP development in 6-10 weeks: focus on key features, AI-accelerated web development, quick market feedback.
mvpStartups.saasMvp_desc: Minimum version of a SaaS product with key features for business model validation.
mvpStartups.mobileApps_desc: MVP for iOS and Android with focus on core functionality.
mvpStartups.webPlatforms_desc: Quick launch of web platforms for market testing.
mvpStartups.process_1_text: We define the minimum set of features to validate the hypothesis.
mvpStartups.process_2_text: AI-accelerated development with focus on speed and quality.
mvpStartups.process_3_text: We launch the MVP and collect feedback from first users.
mvpStartups.process_4_text: We iterate quickly based on data and feedback.

supportScaling.metaDescription: Web website and web app support. The development studio helps scale projects, optimize and grow existing sites.
supportScaling.title: Support and scaling for websites
supportScaling.intro: Support for web sites and web apps. The web studio helps your site grow with your business.
supportScaling.whatWeDo_p1: After launch, it's important to keep developing and optimizing. The web studio provides support and helps scale existing projects.
supportScaling.whatWeDo_p2: The development studio monitors performance, regular updates and adds new features based on data. Website support is part of web development.
supportScaling.techSupport_desc: 24/7 monitoring, bug fixes and technical support.
supportScaling.optimization_desc: Improving performance, speed and user experience.
supportScaling.scaling_desc: Adding new features and scaling architecture for growth.
supportScaling.process_1_text: We assess current product state and identify growth points.
supportScaling.process_2_text: We create a development roadmap based on business goals and data.
supportScaling.process_3_text: We gradually implement improvements and new features.
supportScaling.process_4_text: We continuously monitor performance and optimize solutions.
supportScaling.resultsText: Stable growth and reduced downtime with proactive support.

ecommerce.metaDescription: E-commerce development case: +340% online sales. Payment integration, AI. STEPS LAB web studio.
ecommerce.title: E-commerce platform
ecommerce.subtitle: Web development of a platform for online sales built to scale
ecommerce.overview_p1: The client needed a modern platform for online sales that would combine e-commerce functionality, inventory management and payment system integrations.
ecommerce.overview_p2: Task: create a scalable solution to handle high order volumes and automate business processes.
ecommerce.feature1_text: We built a full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, cart, order system and user account.
ecommerce.feature2_text: We integrated multiple payment systems, including card payments, e-wallets and cash on delivery.
ecommerce.feature3_text: We developed a module for tracking stock, automatic product reservation and supply management.
ecommerce.feature4_text: We implemented AI product recommendations, automatic categorization and search optimization to improve conversion.
ecommerce.result1: Increase in online sales in 6 months
ecommerce.ctaTitle: Ready to create your success case?

saas.title: SaaS MVP
saas.subtitle: AI development for startup: minimum product with AI integration
saas.overview_p1: The startup needed a fast MVP launch to validate the business hypothesis. Task: create a functional product in minimum time without sacrificing quality.
saas.overview_p2: Using AI-accelerated development, we built a full-featured MVP that allowed the client to quickly get market feedback and validate the business model.
saas.feature1_text: We built a minimum product with core functionality in 8 weeks using AI to speed up development.
saas.feature2_text: We implemented automation of routine tasks so the team could focus on strategy and development.
saas.feature3_text: We added an AI module for user data analysis and insight generation for decision-making.
saas.feature4_text: We built a comprehensive system for tracking key metrics to monitor product success.
saas.ctaTitle: Ready to create your success case?

corporate.metaDescription: Corporate website case: +250% conversion, CRM integration. STEPS LAB web studio.
corporate.title: Corporate website
corporate.subtitle: Corporate website development with CRM integration and lead generation automation
corporate.overview_p1: The client needed a modern corporate website that would not only represent the company but also work as a tool for lead generation and sales automation.
corporate.overview_p2: Task: create a site with content management, CRM integration and request handling automation.
corporate.feature1_text: We built a modern corporate site with responsive design, content management and search engine optimization.
corporate.feature2_text: We connected the site to the CRM for automatic sync of requests, contacts and customer interaction history.
corporate.feature3_text: We set up automatic form handling, lead distribution to managers and traffic source tracking.
corporate.feature4_text: We performed comprehensive SEO optimization that improved search rankings and organic traffic.
corporate.ctaTitle: Ready to create your success case?
